items.summary: Add a backend-only administrative wipe/reset operation that clears all stored application data and resets all ID counters so the canister returns to a fresh state.

Update backend user registration/profile-creation logic so that when there are zero stored user profiles (e.g., immediately after a wipe/reset), the first user who creates/completes a profile is automatically assigned the Manager role; all subsequent users default to Assistant role unless explicitly changed by existing logic.

Ensure canister upgrades remain safe after adding the wipe/reset mechanism and first-user manager assignment by adding/adjusting conditional migration logic in the backend migration file so upgraded deployments do not trap and state remains consistent.
